name: Red Crucible: Phoenix Rising
description:
Red Crucible: Phoenix Rising is a free-to-play game where you can engage in intense online armored vehicle battles against players from around the world.



Wage war with the world’s deadliest armored combat vehicles. Engage in furious player versus player armored vehicle combat to dominate various theaters of war ranging from: the fields of Europe, jungle islands, and soon European cities and scorched desert wastelands!



You will have at your disposal iconic fighting machines ranging from Cold War to modern combat vehicles and tanks. Feel the exhilaration and power as you dominate, crush and smash your opponents on the battlefields of war!



Master your knowledge of the various vehicles of war. Learn their strengths and weaknesses in order to fight your way to the top and claim victory!
